title: Eco-Modern Duplex Haven in Heart of Kazimierz Dolny
description: Sophisticated and sustainable living awaits in this contemporary duplex set in a peaceful corner of Rynek, Kazimierz Dolny. Enjoy three spacious bedrooms, each complemented by a sleek en-suite bathroom, spread across 142 sqm of thoughtfully designed eco-modern space. Touches like a cutting-edge lighting system, energy-efficient finishes, generous natural light, and quiet, soundproof walls create a truly comfortable retreat. Direct elevator access ensures fuss-free transitions between floors, while wheelchair accessibility is maintained throughout.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in the charming historic district of Rynek, you'll feel immersed in the town’s artsy spirit and tranquil ambience. The area is close to the Vistula River waterfront, winding bike-friendly paths, and the local market square with cozy cafes and galleries—a unique blend of convenience and serenity perfect for a balanced lifestyle.
lifestyle_benefits: peaceful environment ideal for remote work
just steps from nature and bike paths
proximity to riverside cafés and creative venues
target_buyer: Ideal for digital nomads and ambitious professionals seeking a green, quiet, and inspirational workspace without sacrificing comfort, access, or style—especially those looking for a harmonious blend of rural calm and modern connectivity.
market_positioning: This rare, modern duplex is a top-tier offering in Kazimierz Dolny’s property market: spacious, future-focused, and perfectly placed for remote professionals prioritizing both connection and tranquility.
